author: Oleksii
title: ADA in CIS exchangers/online stores
description: Every user that spends $1000 on cryptocurrency purchases lost about $15-35 as a stock exchange commission https://imgur.com/a/Lk7oHga

assessments.note: The proposal is a worthy example of community outreach, but indirectly aims to increase the number of members in the Cardano community.

For Cardano to expand its sphere of influence, there needs to be means to purchase ADA in CIS-countries.
ADA-adoption on exchanges in such a vast territory holding 236M people will boost influence significantly.
Availability of ADA within exchanges alone will only minimally address the challenge, and not my means of local community centers.
Not bad idea, but this is not the appropiate challenge for it.

The action items for the proposal are fairly straightforward requiring reaching out to relevant exchanges.

Cardano is already the third largest cryptocurrency, so I would find it unlikely that exchanges wouldn't have adding Ada to their roadmaps.
A team would increase this proposal's chances because the amount of exchanges is not specified.
Seeing heavy pressure from thousands of people recently to get listing through Coinbase for USA on its own only allowed access to the ADA coin, but has not proven to do much (yet) to expand Cardano
It seems to be a "one single member team". Not relevant experience.

The proposal doesn't directly resolve the challenge question. All the benefits are indirect results of the proposal which haven't been outlined or specified in the ROI metrics. Eg establishing some network among CIS exchangers to use Cardano could be very important for the community, but the proposal doesn't mention the ongoing work to sustain or establish local community centers
The list of exchanges should have already been included in the proposal to correctly assess the amount of work. A plan to persuade these exchanges is not included.

For $5,000 the ask is to spend two weeks researching then two months calling and convincing conversion of other peoples business models, and change in the end will most likely not be proven that these funds, or this projects efforts caused the change at any single CIS exchanger/online store.
The idea presentation and the quality of the information is very good

solution: We need to convince each exchanger and online store to use ADA on their site. It'll allow to SAVE $15-30 for every $1000 spent.
experience: I had experience working in a call center of the bank (consultations, sales, and advertising of new products), so I can handle this task.
